message: Let's start fair. I take most of the money, but I'll leave you with a decent chunk.  We can adjust later if you'd like.
I'll start with a more balanced offer. Let's see if you'll accept this one.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it closer to the middle this time.  It's getting risky to keep rejecting offers.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about compromising. I'll try to meet you in the middle this time.
